div.h2: Welcome to the North Collins Central School District

p.span: Our district offers a safe and supportive learning environment that strives to maximize educational opportunities for all students, faculty, staff, and community members. We nurture responsibility, creativity, energy, and open-mindedness to empower successful contributors to a global society.

div.a: Read More about Special Video Message
Read More about FREE Meal Requests

p.span: We recently passed the half-year point of the school year and celebrated (mostly at the Elementary
day of school. Soon the cold and dark mornings give way to earlier sunrises and
milder temperatures. It is also a time when we begin the final stages of the 2018 voter-approved Capital Project work.
As you may recall in December 2018, North Collins residents

span.style: color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Tahoma;
color: rgb(40, 40, 40); letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 18px;
color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: latoregular; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-size: 15px;

div.p: North Collins Central School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district's activities and programs. North Collins Central School District also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
